content: “If he drags the Cavs to the finals…” He plays for a team that SHOULD be in the finals. I’m not sure how their getting there should be considered a miraculous act. “If they win another title…” I’m a big believer in that old Dean Smith quote after he won his first title: “I’m not a better coach than I was yesterday.” Lebron is what he is. If you think that’s the GOAT, then fine. But nothing that happens next should change your mind at this point.
